lines: 1. Ndefwaisha kwimbe-shi nyimbo, Lyashuka ishina lyenu:
Mfumu yandi iya lulumbi, Lyashuka ishina lyenu.
2. Ni Yesu, e-shina lisuma; Lyashuka ishina lyenu;
Ku bantu a-babi-pa bonse, Lyashuka ishina Iyenu.
3. Wafumya ma-ka ya Satana; Lyashuka ishina lyenu;
Umulopa wakwe wawamya, Lyashuka ishina lyenu.
